snippet: If you were a celebrity, you were at Hedi Slimane’s Saint Laurent show at the Palladium in Los Angeles.
abstract: Hedi Slimane’s Saint Laurent show at Hollywood Palladium draws hoards of A-list celebrities, including Justin Bieber, Jane Fonda, Lady Gaga and more.
lead_paragraph: If you were a celebrity, you were at Hedi Slimane’s Saint Laurent show at the Palladium in Los Angeles.

headline.print_headline: Saint Laurent Woos a Rock ’n’ Roll Crowd
headline.main: Saint Laurent’s High-Voltage Glamour Woos a Rock ’n’ Roll Crowd
